author: Staff Reporter
text:
A 17-year-old juvenile was remanded for attempt to sexually assault of an 8-year-old girl here on Tuesday.

The accused from Kundukurukki here had lured the Standard III girl, who was playing outside her home, and attempted to sexually assault her.

The girl came back home with severe injuries and told her parents about the incident.

A complaint was made and the juvenile, a resident of the same village, was secured.

Similar offence

According to police sources, the accused had already served a term for a similar sexual offence in juvenile home and was released only 6 months ago.

The accused has now been booked under Sections 7 and 8 of POCSO Act.
title: Juvenile remanded for sexual assault bid
